Item.Value: [Text:Finally. It's nice to speak to someone who can help me. I'm $Character_4$, nice to meet you, etcetera. Be a dear and arrange me someplace to stay will you? My research has been stalled for long enough.][UnlockBuildingID:16]
[Text:Oh, hello. I guess I have a moment. My latest experiment hasn't proven fruitful.][Default]
[Text:For me? Oh no, you shouldn't have!]
[Text:You got this for me? I... thank you. really, this will be invaluable to my research.]
[Text:Are you sure? I guess I can join you for an adventure today.]
[Text:Sorry... I've got things to do today. Maybe later?]
[Text:I hate weather like this. It just serves to delay my research.][Weather:Raining]
[Text:Hm. I'm thinking I might take a walk. I despise the rain, but there are several species of flowers I'm interested in that only bloom in the rain.][Weather:Raining]

[Text:I love my brother, but he can be so frustratingly vain sometimes. I was trying to tell him about my latest magical discovery and do you know what he said to me afterwards? "Do you think this new pin goes with my robes." I swear, he doesn't listen to a word I say.][Villager:3]

[Text:$Name$, you know $Character_6$ right? Do you have any idea why she asked me to arm wrestle the other day? I didn't know what to say, so I just stood there, staring at her until she left.][Villager:6]
[Text:I tried to talk with $Character_17$ the other day but she just blew me off. She said she had no time for me! Can you believe that!][Villager:17]
[Text:You know, $Character_2$ is a lot more knowledgeable than he looks, once you get him to stop babbling and talk straight.][Villager:2]
[Text:$Character_11$ said she was going to try to get a book for me, but it hasn't arrived yet. Do you think it's too soon to ask her about it?][Villager:11]
